column4: I am using Ubuntu 11.04 with nVidia GeForce 7300 SE/7200 GS card.With the latest nVidia driver can not able to start unity,however 170 driver somehow manages it...any idea????
<usr13>yeah,I guess it does.....any idea how to fix it
<foundit>I have found that my card is 'blacklisted'....why is that?
If it's "black-listed", that's certainly not a good thing.
